row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.RETRY_REQUEST_STATUS
row.description: Enter retry information for checking request status

row.xui: <dialog height="422" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Provide retry information about checking the request status"><properties><entry name="text">Provide retry information about checking the request status</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_COUNT#
row.xui: <integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_COUNTs.00" max="500" min="1" nl="1" text="Retry Count" tooltip="Number of retry attempts to check the status of request.Value should be between 1 and 500."> <properties> <entry listparam="N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Retry Count</entry> <entry name="min">1</entry> <entry name="max">500</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_COUNTs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Number of retry attempts to check the status of request.Value should be between 1 and 500.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_INTERVAL#
row.xui: <integer alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_INTERVALs.00" max="600" min="5" nl="1" text="Retry Interval (seconds)" tooltip="Specify how frequently you want to check the status of request.Value should be between 5 and 600."> <properties> <entry listparam="N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">Retry Interval (seconds)</entry> <entry name="min">5</entry> <entry name="max">600</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_AZR_RETRY_INTERVALs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specify how frequently you want to check the status of request.Value should be between 5 and 600.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue">0</entry> </properties> </integer>
